TopicTitle: S.S. Grand Precursor - Precursors Planet Pack Grand Tour!

Articles.Content:
@wpetula! Its time for me to challenge your pack, with one of the hardest challenges in stock KSP! "The Grand Tour!"

 

Part one should be coming soon, but in the meantime, here is some lore!

After the crash on Frontier, the Kerbals rebuilt and set up a colony on Frontier's moon, Scar, after they did that, there little egotistical brains, thought up a plan! "Lets go to every body in this system" Wherner Von Kerman says, emerging from the cryosleep. And Thus, The S.S. Grand Precursor was born!

See you when the first part drops!
